data.title: Teacher Spotlight Series – Becky Therrien
data.meta_description: Every month, Modern Yoga brings spotlight to one of our wonderful teachers. Get to know Becky Therrain!
data.text:
I never intended to be a yoga teacher. I decided to enter teacher training because I love yoga & wanted to get a deeper understanding of it & was struggling to do so in a regular class. It wasn’t until l was pretty far into the training that my goal shifted a bit. Looking back I’m not even 100% sure why. I think I feel strongly about the benefits yoga can have for every person. Whether it’s physical benefits from a fitness perspective, flexibility to improve day to day movement to help relieve anxiety. Whatever someone’s goal or current struggle with their mind or body, I believe with my whole heart yoga will help.

I have two…

1. Leave your ego behind. Pay attention each day to what feels ok for your body. One day the right choice is to keep finding your edge & challenge yourself, but the next class it’s to back off & show your body grace. It’s your practice, no one else’s. No one is watching what you can do or judging how well you are doing it. Just focus on yourself each time you are on you mat & what the right choices are for your body in that moment.

2. Try an inversion. It’s empowering!

Join us in wishing a VERY Happy Birthday to Instructor Matt Dressler!! We hope you get to enjoy this beautiful day celebrating with those you love! Thank you for always being ready to lend a helping hand around the studio, we appreciate all that you've done and continue to do for us. We truly hope today is wonderful for you!!

Wish Matt a big Happy Birthday, then be sure to schedule your next class with him!

Click here --> modernyogacle.com/class-schedule/

Join Carrie for a relaxing evening, the perfect class to completely unwind from your weekend and prepare you for the week ahead!! Beginning with Restorative Yoga, Carrie will guide you through seated poses where your body will be fully supported by blocks, bolsters and other props allowing complete surrender of your muscles and deep connective tissue. Next, Yoga Nidra or Dream Yoga, where Carrie will provide meditative cues to allow your mind to soften. Together, a beautiful combination for a complete physical and mental reset 🙏

Reserve Today for the Early Bird Pricing --> modernyogacle.com/restorative-yoga-yoga-nidra-event-2/
